casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette McNEILL. No. 446A13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2016. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of February 2016 by Defendant to Bypass the Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of March 2016."
